post.body: I guess we're going to Azitra the next time you're buying.

Next to the NC State game I'll put an exploding tomato.

Wasn't me. But I kinda wish it was now.
If you get an iPhone I have a great wallpaper for it.
I don't have that album. But I can never get enough of Fantastic Planet.
That's awesome. One of my favorite bands.
You listen to Failure?
Your Mac crashes once per day!? That's not normal...
Probably @Diambro!

Go back the bed.

ka-kow!
WORKIN', FOOL!
I'm not a Coldplay apologist by any means, but the version of Viva La Vida in that video has been pitch adjusted.
That sounds like a flight to Nashville, but maybe the "Everyone Cares About My Music" disease has spread to Chatanooga.
I get a lot of those and Akismet doesn't always catch them. Very annoying. Next step: close comments completely.
Nope, I'm in Raleigh.
Biltmore Estate in Asheville, NC. Followed by a tour of the finest NC BBQ joints. And then the Outer Banks.
Don't listen to @DiMambro. You can still make impulse purchases when you're married. It's just that there's a discussion first.
Personally, I think you should've gone for the new camera.
Shoot me an email. Plenty of time to answer questions while waiting in line. :)
Woohoo!
Which one?
Glad you both finally made it home!
That's why I rarely fly on weekends, not matter the time of year. Rookie Fly Zone.
Congrats!
Skip the video store and download The Wire on your Apple TV.
How did we ever survive without Amazon Prime?

i have two and they're excellent. even my original b one still works (used when traveling).
and label it MENS ROOM

jerk
Me too. THat and the next season of Storm Chasers. Guess who's the Discovery HD whore? I am, that's who.
Congrats again! A great way to start the new year.
I read your rss feed, so i'm in your audience but you just don't know it. well, now you do.
just visited your blog, so you're up to 1 1/2 visits. You're welcome.
No, really.
OMG A TON A JAMBALYA IS LEFT OVER. WHO"S COMING OVER?
Listen, I look down on Bojangles as much as the next yuppie but I cannot deny their Cajun Chicken Filet sandwich.
The Great UPS Wait.
Cat just spilled/splattered a perfectly great glass of sparkling water. He felt threatened by the bubbles.
Best place in Raleigh for Indian food? _Indian food_, @DiMambro, not _beer_.
In the latest entry in my parents' travel blog, my mom gives "I've been on Facebook" as an excuse for not posting more frequently.
"Cyber Monday" just has the wrong ring to it.
Now that was a lunch we can believe in.
At the Carolina game.
Is that smell leftover turkey or cat poop? Yep, it's cat poop.
Can't believe I didn't buy Mobile Fotos before now. Great iPhone Flickr app with slick upload. #behindthetimes

heading out shortly to put my new camera through some more testing.
Any Path Finder users out there?
Awesome light this morning and totally missing it.
put a lid down on it and everything will be alright
So, Hertz. You're telling me that if I book with my #1 Club membership the car costs me $10 _more_ per day than if book without?
Fish n chips at the Yard House.
Las Vegas is proof that sadness is drought tolerant.
I have a feeling that The perfumey smell at The Venetian is going to stay with me for a while. Ugh.

Switched to Tweetie. Just FYI. I like the multiple account support.
Disneyland

If you're flying somewhere for the holidays, try being nice to the airline employees. It could be my wife you're yelling at. Just FYI.
50! http://twitpic.com/unh0
30 minutes til game time.
House property tax paid, car property tax paid. Now to shampoo the carpet where the cat puked. #myglamorouslife
I know FedEx and UPS are busy but it doesn't mean they have to speed around my neighborhood #getoffmyproperty #youngwhippersnapper
This gray, misty, foggy weather is perfectly suited to Sigur Ros. Wife says she likes the weather b/c it reminds her of home. Just FYI.
The wife and I had Sosta Cafe for lunch. Oh, yum.
celebrating yesterday's snow in Vegas with a The Killers marathon.
Foggy Raleigh.

Carolina looks like arse vs. BC. Ugh. We may be getting our first L of the season.
Without any (like none) help files to clue me in to some of the finer points of using Espresso, it's extremely frustrating.

xbox red-ringed and they say i'm out of three year warranty, when it's only been 1.5. boo.
